title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 4547 and S. 772 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
April 13, 2018
On Friday, April 13, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 4547, the “Strengthening Protections for Social Security Beneficiaries Act of 2018,” which modifies oversight of the representative payee system for Social Security beneficiaries;andS. 772, the “Ashlynne Mike AMBER Alert in Indian Country Act,” which reauthorizes and amends the program that provides grants for AMBER Alert communication plans.
